attributes.action: Introduce official regional capital cities throughout england, e.g capital of the north - Leeds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: with the north, south divide getting bigger and bigger and London being seamingly the unfair centre of almost all things british I propose that the government introduce 3 or 4 regional capitals throughout england, (for example Birmingham, Leeds and Newcastle) to take the demand away from London and to promote the qualities of england both on a national and international level
